---
name: Clarification or Ambiguity
about: Identify unclear, conflicting, or underspecified material
---

**Location**
Link to the document or section in question.

**What is unclear or conflicting**
Be precise. Quote if possible.

**Why this matters**
Explain the impact on interpretation, rigor, or downstream work.

**Suggested clarification (optional)**
If you have one, propose wording.
